idea-plugin.name: Darkyen's Time Tracker
idea-plugin.description:
Track the time spent on a project through a status bar widget.

  • Click the widget or start typing to start counting
  • Pauses the timer automatically when idle (after two minutes of inactivity by default)
  • Click timer widget for options, most things can be configured
  • git integration, injects the time it took to create the commit into the commit message
  • Time is saved in IDE's workspace files, does not clutter project's directory
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• Updated for IntelliJ Platform 2020.1 - the UI opening the settings menu has changed, because IDE now uses right-click for something different
  • Minor optimizations
